issue.title: catkin tools is not python3 compatible

content.raw:
it looks like catkin-tools is then default behavior of `_ros_setup_buildsh.bash`

* #!/osrf/release-tools/src/ab0ab7b9d9ee40bc08f96a6391eb25410660c7de/jenkins-scripts/docker/lib/_ros_setup_buildsh.bash#lines-14:39

since there's no explicit variable for using catkin tools, I think we can just change the default to colcon, and it would fully disable catkin tools.
